name: Cytus Protocol
intro: Bridging the gap between real-world assets and DeFi
introduce: Cytus protocol is a decentralized protocol that aims to bridge the gap between Real-world assets and DeFi. Cytus allows investors to park stablecoin for sustainable yield with high capital efficiency, plus a marketplace of top Trad-Fi institutions who act as intermediaries handling RWA operations deploying capital into end borrowers’ hands.
